concept.title: RPC Connections
concept.shortdesc: In an SDC RPC destination, the RPC connections define where the destination passes data.

conbody.p: SDC RPC destinationRPC connectionsThe RPC connection is the host and port number of the SDC RPC origin to receive the data. Define multiple connections to allow the SDC RPC destination to round-robin through multiple pipelines in case of bottlenecks.
